title: Hamukione
author: Hamukione
content: Hey everyone.Im looking into making a tool for mining pools, but I want to be able to support as many pools as possible.I am specifically looking for pool mining software that has a premade api built into it.If you know the name of some software, please let me know.Is NMP still active and used?Mention as many as you can, and if you have a link to the source, ill love you even more! <3Thank you everyone /Hamukione

comments.author: Hamukione
comments.body: Is MPOS still being used? Found Suprnova.cc is running it, but I could really use some guidance from the community

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Have you watched similar tutorials?How to build your own altcoin cryptocurrency mining poolA course for those who already know how to mine, but wish to expand their knowledge to creating their own mining poolhttps://www.udemy.com/course/how-to-build-your-own-mining-pool/As the miners say, the problem is not to build a pool, but to attract miners.
